text: Parwardigar, maine ek be aab-o-giyah wadi (barren valley) mein apni aulad ke ek hissey ko tere mohtaram ghar ke paas laa basaya hai. Parwardigar, yeh maine is liye kya hai ke yeh log yahan namaz qayam karein. Lihaza tu logon ke dilon ko inka mushtaq bana (hearts of the people towards them) aur unhein khane ko phal de, shayad ke yeh shukarguzar banein
